definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
(conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items

sentences.english: A dual-channel instantaneous soil radon measurement instrument based on the method of electrostatic collection is designed.
sentences.chinese: 設計一套基於靜電收集法的雙道瞬時土壤測氡儀。

sentences.english: There was a significant decrease in the subjects' pretest and post-test scores of attitude and motivation.
sentences.chinese: 學生的英語學習態度和動機前後測分數有顯著降低。

sentences.english: Total serum testosterone was assayed by Chemoluminescence immunoassay.
sentences.chinese: 化學發光免疫分析法測血清總睾酮。

sentences.english: A geodesic dome is a round building made of many straight-sided pieces.
sentences.chinese: 測地線拱頂是一個全面建設的許多直幅片面。

sentences.english: This study employs the experimental designing mode of the experiment-group and the control-group before and after experiment training.
sentences.chinese: 本研究採用了實驗組與控制組前後測實驗設計模式。

sentences.english: Because arc length of trajectory is regarded as the variant in geodesics based method, it .
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種基於測地線的機器人軌跡規劃方法。

sentences.english: The membrane was also titrated with AAP by measuring the intrinsic fluorescence of protein.
sentences.chinese: 用AAP滴定紅細胞膜，測蛋白質自身熒光變化。

sentences.english: Based on the calorimetric tritium method, an automatic tritium measurement device was designed.
sentences.chinese: 以量熱測氚法爲基礎，設計了一套自動化測氚裝置。

sentences.english: In one of them, three significant digits can be reached.
sentences.chinese: 其中方法一所測結果的有效位數可達三位。

sentences.english: Discussion is based on the fact that the shortest arc on surface is geodesic.
sentences.chinese: 應用“曲面上最短弧爲測地線”的事實進行了討論。

sentences.english: Check the acidity of the soil with a test kit.
sentences.chinese: 用試驗器具測一下土壤的酸度。

sentences.english: ISO 7779 (1999) Acoustics – Measurement of airborne noise emitted by information technology and telecommunications equipment.
sentences.chinese: 資訊及通訊設備的噪音量測技術。

sentences.english: It is the Heisenberg Uncertainty Principle working with Murphy's law.
sentences.chinese: 這就是海森堡測不準原理和墨菲定律在起作用。

sentences.english: The activity of serum CPK was examined with automatic biochemistry analyzer.
sentences.chinese: 以生化自動分析儀測血清CPK活性。

sentences.english: The teacher will test us on our French.
sentences.chinese: 老師將要測我們的法語。

sentences.english: He came back, and with him he brought the Uncertainty Principle.
sentences.chinese: 三週後他回來了，和他一起的還有測不準原理。

definition: to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody
to estimate/to reckon/CL:個|个[ge4]/(coll.) to suppose
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
outcome/result/conclusion/in the end/as a result/to kill/to dispatch
